newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech BICS100 bond index falls 0.107pts to 101.165.
newsitem.headline: Czech BICS100 bond index falls 0.107pts to 101.165.

text.p: The BICS 100 index measuring the Czech Republic's most liquid bonds fell 0.107 points in Tuesday's trading to 101.165, bank Ceska Sporitelna said.
It said the duration of the index portfolio shortened by 0.003 points to 2.500 years.

The BICSG 100 index, which Ceska Sporitelna calculates using only government bonds, fell 0.204 points to 97.409, the bank said, while the duration of the index portfolio shortened by 0.004 points to 2.274 years.
It said the yield index YBICS 1000 rose 4.105 points to 1,127.446.
